events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue described by the customer has been identified and classified under the Refund cluster.
The support case has been assigned to agent Mia Johnson for further handling and resolution.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to initiate a refund due to receiving the wrong item.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 7845123, and I've attached a clear picture showing the incorrect item that was delivered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund right away and you should see the amount credited back within 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund process details. Looking forward to the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your case.
Since no further issues have been reported, your refund case has now been closed. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a brief survey to gather your feedback on how we handled your refund request and overall support experience.
